events.heading: Oh no! The Ghost Bat is now extinct!
events.description: When animals' homes are destroyed, they have no place to live :(

events.heading: There is a flood at Burdekin River!
events.description: Floods can happen very quickly after rain and storms.

variations.thenText: Great preparations! You suffer less from the flooding
variations.elseText: Next time try to prepare better, so you don't lose so much!

events.heading: A bushfire has started near Hughenden!
events.description: Bushfires are not common in Queensland, but occur more often when its hotter.

events.heading: The bushfire at Hughenden has worsened
events.description: Bushfires can move very quickly, especially if the wind changes

variations.thenText: Because you prepared well, the fire didn't do as much damage
variations.elseText: If you had prepared, you wouldn't have lost as much money in the fire.

events.heading: Cyclone Winifred has been sighted off the coast.
events.description: The cyclone is coming. You should prepare for it!

events.heading: A category 3 cyclone named Winifred has appeared!
events.description: Cyclones are a huge threat every summer in Queensland. As well as destructive winds, cyclones also typically result in flooding, often over large areas.

variations.thenText: As the sea temperature rises, cyclones get bigger and appear more often!
Good news! Your preparations meant the cyclone did less damage :)
variations.elseText: Oh no! By failing to prepare your supplies and your farm for the cyclone, your sustained more damage.

actions.name: Buy emergency rations
actions.description: Stock up on bottled water and baked beans!

actions.name: Buy torch, radio and batteries
actions.description: A torch helps you see if the power goes out, and a radio lets you know when its safe to go outside again.

actions.name: Prepare your home for a cyclone
actions.description: If you clear things from your yard, then they won't fly around in the storm.

actions.name: Turn off your air-conditioning
actions.description: The air-conditioner uses lots of energy, which costs you money and impacts the environment.

actions.name: Trim your banana plants before the storm hits.
actions.description: If you trim your plants before the storm comes, they will grow back more quickly.

actions.name: Prepare your home for a bushfire
actions.description: Fill your gutters with water and turn your sprinklers on to stop things from burning.

actions.name: Plant some native trees
actions.description: Native trees are great places for birds and animals to live.

actions.name: Install solar power
actions.description: Solar power saves carbon, and means you're having less impact on the environment

actions.name: Use extra fertilizer
actions.description: Extra fertilizer will mean more bananas, but some of it will run off and pollute the environment

actions.name: Buy a bigger tractor
actions.description: With the new T1000 you can harvest more bananas. It does pollute a bit though...

actions.name: Clear some native forest
actions.description: With more land, you can grow lots more bananas! I'm not sure where the animals will live though
